nl.strohalm.cyclos.scheduling

Class HourlyScheduledTasks

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • nl.strohalm.cyclos.scheduling.HourlyScheduledTasks
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class HourlyScheduledTasks
extends java.lang.Thread
    A thread used to run a batch of scheduled tasks. This thread always have the hour it's execution should operate with. That hour is passed to ScheduledTask.run(java.util.Calendar)
    Author:
    luis
